von den männlichen Neurosen heilen lassen

dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: CHURCH HIERARCHY IS AN OPPRESSIVE REGIME

kernfrasen: Geist auslöschen, wo immer er weht

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Glied um Glied vertrocknen und abfallen

cognitieve_implicaties: The institution is a dying organism, not just a failing business.
theologische_implicaties: The Spirit is the 'blood' or 'water' of the church; without it, the structure is a corpse.
ethische_implicaties: Resistance is a matter of survival/health, not just policy disagreement.
onbedoelde_consequenties: Suggests that the 'limbs' (people) are passive victims of the body's decay.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: Re-activates the visceral horror of necrosis to describe institutional stagnation.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher consistently aligns the 'death' of the institution with 'rigidity/stagnation' and 'life' with 'movement/Spirit/democracy'.

incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The church is simultaneously a powerful, crushing machine and a helpless, decaying corpse.
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: An oppressor has agency and force; a corpse has neither.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: Uses the biblical narrative of the valley of dry bones to bridge the gap between the 'dead institution' and the 'living Spirit'.

sterktes.beschrijving: Revitalizes the 'Body of Christ' metaphor by focusing on the pathology of 'necrosis' rather than just 'unity'.
sterktes.voorbeeld: Warum wollt ihr lieber am lebendigen Leibe Glied um Glied vertrocknen...

risicos.beschrijving: Reduces complex systemic and theological issues to 'male neuroses'.
risicos.voorbeeld: euch von den männlichen Neurosen heilen zu lassen
risicos.potentiele_impact: Psychologizes the 'enemy' rather than engaging their theological arguments.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: A battlefield/hospital where a rigid, dying hierarchy is crushing a vibrant, living 'people' (Laos).
sub_worlds: The Valley of Dry Bones (eschatological hope)

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: High; grounds the critique in physical reality.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Re-contextualizing the title through the lens of 'patriarchal complex' and the command 'call no man father'.
verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: God as the only Father; believers as equal siblings.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by a 'Life vs. Death' binary, mapped onto 'Spirit/People vs. Institution/Hierarchy'. It uses visceral medical and biological metaphors to provoke a sense of urgency and disgust regarding the status quo.

revitalisatie_suggesties.huidige_status: Often used as a vague cliché.
revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Connect the 'Wind' of the Spirit more concretely to the 'Breath' needed for the 'Dry Bones' to speak.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The Spirit is the oxygen in the lungs of the poor as they pray the Bible.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The Church as both 'Oppressor' and 'Dying Body'.
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Use the metaphor of an 'Autoimmune Disease' where the body attacks its own healthy cells (the women/the poor).

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Machines can be fixed by technicians; the Spirit cannot be 'engineered'.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Emphasize the organic nature of the church to avoid a purely secular-political solution.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To bridge the gap between the 'Spirit' and 'Growth/Fruit', moving away from purely medical/pathological language.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A powerful example of cognitive homiletics that uses 'Schema Disruption' to challenge institutional power through the biological reality of life and death.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Focuses on the cognitive 'mapping' of death to hierarchy rather than just the beauty of the Ezechiel imagery.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Moves beyond 'experience' to the underlying conceptual structures that make the experience meaningful.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals that the preacher views 'Democracy' not as a political choice but as a 'biological necessity' for the survival of the Body of Christ.

appendices.notities: The sermon relies heavily on the 'BODY IS A CONTAINER FOR THE SPIRIT' image schema.
